hints_html: The for loop will run 20 times. Each diagonal entry has the same row and column index.
hints_latex:
The for loop will run 20 times. Each diagonal entry has the same row and
column index.
hints_raw: The for loop will run 20 times. Each diagonal entry has the same row and column index.
question: A 30
statement_html:
Write a MATLAB for loop that generates a \(20\times 20\) matrix C given by

\(C = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & ... & 0 \\ 0 & 2 & 0 & ... & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 3 & & 0 \\ \vdots & \vdots & & \ddots & \vdots \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & ... & 20 \\ \end{bmatrix}\)
statement_latex:
Write a MATLAB for loop that generates a $20\times 20$ matrix C given by

$C = \begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & 0 & ... & 0 \\
0 & 2 & 0 & ... & 0 \\
0 & 0 & 3 &  & 0 \\
\vdots & \vdots &  & \ddots & \vdots \\
0 & 0 & 0 & ... & 20 \\
\end{bmatrix}$
statement_raw:
Write a MATLAB for loop that generates a <math>20\times 20</math> matrix C given by

<math>
C = \begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & 0 & ... & 0 \\
0 & 2 & 0 & ... & 0 \\
0 & 0 & 3 &  & 0 \\
\vdots & \vdots &  & \ddots & \vdots \\
0 & 0 & 0 & ... & 20 \\
\end{bmatrix}
</math>
